messages.message:
Brian
Did this message reach you?
Melanie Marie Jeanveau accepted your request.

Yes sir
Sorry it went to archive but won't go there anymore

Brian
Just curious.
I thought they blocked me

Did they?
I guess not if you thought they did,  sorry. Well there's no reason to block you. Unless you're harrassing people or spamming and you've been extremely respectful so I see no need to block

Brian
Oh thank you   I like having conversations on the discussion board.  People are really smart there.  Do you think it's possible to troll people with kindness?
Best way to be! Lol add a little humour and that's a wicked cocktail for a good time

Brian
Matthew 5:44 (KJV)  But I say unto you, Love your enemies, bless 
them that curse you, do good to them that hate you, and pray for them 
which despitefully use you, and persecute you;
Is that information pertinent to you?
It seems like common sense knowledge

Brian
I agree.  I wish it was more applicable to the internet, do you think people just come here to vent at each other?

Probably. There doesn't seem like any other method to the madness. Nobody wants to listen to reason just make fun of people. Although some people I find really want to share knowledge. Its rare. But it happens and when it does I revel in it.
The thing I hate the most is when people slew off degrading comments for no reason. Its awful

Brian
I try to be really polite.  I am not here to make fun of anyone, just understand their thinking.
I had a really great conversation with a Physicist, that was interesting.
Awesome I wish I could have more intelligent conversation. I try but I'm a loner for the most part. My husband is more religious than i. And we both are super sciencey nerds

Brian
Awesome, I am very nerdy.  I am trying to get a job with DARPA.
